name: Street Racing (itch) (RM Studios)
description:
Street Racing

By Awesome With Rex

Goal

Race over the road, avoiding the cars. Stay inside the screen. You will need to collect the petrol. And watch out for the police. They will try to ram you.

Playing

Simply drive using the arrow keys. Think about how to avoid the police cars.

Special Keys

ends the game

shows the help file

switch graphics mode

Design

This is a rather simple game. It was made with Gamemaker V8.1.
